sqlMap.select: select lng, lat from sc_unit where unit_address = (select ACTIVITY_PLACE from sc_course where sc_course_pk = #coursePk#)
select * from sc_course_teacher_qrcode where fk_teacher = #FK_TEACHER# and fk_course = #FK_COURSE#
sqlMap.update: update SC_COURSE_TEACHER_QRCODE set STATUS=1 where SC_COURSE_TEACHER_QRCODE_PK = #SC_COURSE_TEACHER_QRCODE_PK#
update SC_COURSE_TEACHER set status = 2 where fk_sc_course = #coursePk# and FK_TEACHER = #userPk#
